frontmatter.title: Toolformer & API-Augmented Models

labPresets.initialPrompt: Use Toolformer-style prompting to call an external calculator API and solve: 248 * 37.

examples: Query a weather API: What is the temperature in Paris right now?

quiz.q: True or False: Toolformer enables models to call external APIs during inference.

choices: Calling an API to fetch stock prices
quiz.answer: Calling an API to fetch stock prices
